descriptionHtml:
[center][i][b]
[/b][/i][i][b]Here is my latest model. This was a sword that someone had made for Oblivion
years ago. I have not seen a port or a remake for Skyrim, so I decided I
would create it. I did not design this sword to be an end game sword,
its craftable under the Ebony Smithing and temperable. [/b][/i]

[i]I wanted to make this sword a little more unique, but I lack the skills
and knowledge of the CK still. So therefor I'm just putting it out there
as a weapon. If anyone likes it enough to undertake making an actual
mod for it, please do. Just credit me in your mod. I still have a long
way to go with my modeling and texturing skill, but this is the best
piece I've made yet. Hope you enjoy it.[/i]

[i]CREDITS:
[/i][i]Kit Rae for the design of the actual sword
[/i][i]Bestheda for Skyrim
[/i][i]Nexus for the community
[/i][i]and EVERYONE who's ever created a mod that i downloaded to inspire me to make my own
[/i][i]
[/i][i]TOOLS:
[/i][i]3ds Max
[/i][i]Photoshop[/i][/center]
author: me
